column2: "Na bosoom a otsia esuon no mu
column3: bosoom no ne da a odzi kan no
column4: hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen edwuma: ɔyɛ totorobɛntohɛn da ma hom."

column2: "Na hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor
column4: nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm;"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr
column3: isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column4: ebupɛn du mu ebiasa nka oguannyin no ho
column6: "na ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka eguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho:"

column2: "na bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor
"mfa nka bosoom fofor ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr ho
column5: dɛ mbrɛ no ho mbra tsetsee
column6: nyɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na bosoom a otsia esuon no ara mu da a otsia du no hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; na hom mfa akɔnkyen; eso mma hom nnyɛ edwuma biara:"
"na hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor
column4: nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia; a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr
column3: isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column4: ebupɛn du mu ebiasa nka ɔnantwisaa no ho
column5: ebupɛn du mu ebien nka oguannyin kor no ho
column7: "ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka nguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho:"

column2: "bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka mpata bɔn ho afɔr
column4: nye n’edziban afɔr
column5: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a otsia duenum no hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara
column3: na hom nhyɛ fa nda esuon mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column3: ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa duebiasa
column4: nguannyin ebien
column5: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia; a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr
column3: isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column4: ebupɛn du mu ebiasa ebiasa nkeka anantwisaa du ebiasa no mu ɔnantwisaa biara ho
column5: ebupɛn du mu ebien ebien nkeka nguannyin ebien no mu kor ho
column7: "na ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka nguambaa duanan no mu eguambaa biara ho:"

column2: "na bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia ebien no hom mfa anantwisaa mburwa duebien
column4: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm mbra:"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia ebiasa no anantwisaa dubiako
column4: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm;"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa
column4: nye nguambaa no ho

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia anan no anantwisaa du
column4: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa
column4: nye nguambaa no ho

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia enum no anantwisaa akron
column4: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa
column4: nye nguambaa no ho

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia esia no anantwisaa awɔtwe
column4: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa
column4: nye nguambaa ho

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia esuon no anantwisaa esuon
column4: nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa
column4: nye nguambaa no ho

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Da a otsia awɔtwe no hom mbɔ ngua a no mu yɛ nwin: mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara:"
"mbom hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column3: ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE: ɔnantwisaa kor
column4: oguannyin kor
column5: nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm:"

column2: "n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka ɔnantwisaa
column4: nye nguambaa no ho

column2: "nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor: mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no ho."

column2: "Iyinom na hom mfa mbrɛ EWURADZE wɔ hom afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ no mu
column3: mfa nka hom anohobadze nye hom ayamuyi afɔr ho
column4: wɔ hom ɔhyew afɔr

column2: "Na Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara."
